mapper.select: SELECT album_id AS albumId, SUM(IF(stat_type = 'PLAY', stat_num, 0)) AS playStatNum, SUM(IF(stat_type = 'SUBSCRIBE', stat_num, 0)) AS subscribeStatNum, SUM(IF(stat_type = 'BUY', stat_num, 0)) AS buyStatNum, SUM(IF(stat_type = 'COMMENT', stat_num, 0)) AS commentStatNum FROM album_stat WHERE album_id = #{albumId} and is_deleted = 0
